show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #87 Kevin Deleu, Part deux
subtitle: #87 Kevin Deleu, Part deux
summary:
Kevin Deleu is back this week to continue our discussions from a few weeks ago. Today we unpack AI protocols and Kevin gives me an EPD's for dummies course. Kevin talks about grazing in Brazil and we discuss and debate the future of the cattle business, the seed stock business and genetics.

Allejandro Carillo video

Powerplus Cattle Company

https://www.deleuranch.net/
